sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Final Working Version // Do not Edit</description>
        <name>Ui action & BR Final version</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function demandASMT() {
    var id = g_scratchpad.demandASMT;
    var otherMessage = '';
    var type = g_form.getValue('metric_type');
    var url = 'assessment_take2.do?sysparm_assessable_sysid=' + id + '&sysparm_assessable_type=' + type + '&sysparm_reader_view=true';
    getMessage("Assessment Results", function(msg) {
        otherMessage = msg;
    });
    var d = new GlideOverlay({

        title: otherMessage,
        iframe: url,
        width: '100%',
        height: '100%',
		right: 1000,
        onAfterLoad: function() {
            var iframe = d.getIFrameElement();
            setTimeout(function() {
                iframe.height = parseInt(iframe.height) + 1;
            }, 0);
        }
    });
    d.render();
}

function reviewASMT() {
    var id = g_scratchpad.reviewASMT;
    var otherMessage = '';
    var type = g_form.getValue('metric_type');
    var url = 'assessment_take2.do?sysparm_assessable_sysid=' + id + '&sysparm_assessable_type=' + type + '&sysparm_reader_view=true';
    getMessage("Assessment Results", function(msg) {
        otherMessage = msg;
    });
    var c = new GlideOverlay({

        title: otherMessage,
        iframe: url,
        width: '47%',
        height: '100%',
		right: 500,
        onAfterLoad: function() {
            var iframe = c.getIFrameElement();
            setTimeout(function() {
                iframe.height = parseInt(iframe.height) + 1;
            }, 0);
        }
    });
    c.render();
}

function reviewideaASMT() {
    var id = g_scratchpad.reviewideaASMT;
    var otherMessage = '';
    var type = g_form.getValue('metric_type');
    var url = 'assessment_take2.do?sysparm_assessable_sysid=' + id + '&sysparm_assessable_type=' + type + '&sysparm_reader_view=true';
    getMessage("Assessment Results", function(msg) {
        otherMessage = msg;
    });
    var k = new GlideOverlay({

        title: otherMessage,
        iframe: url,
        width: '120%',
        height: '100%',
		left: 1038,
        onAfterLoad: function() {
            var iframe = k.getIFrameElement();
            setTimeout(function() {
                iframe.height = parseInt(iframe.height) + 1;
            }, 0);
        }
    });
    k.render();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>Gokul Nath</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-09-29 14:45:24</sys_created_on>

        <sys_name>Ui action & BR Final version</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>

    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
